original_text: But other things that live in the water do not have fins or scales. Those are not clean food for you. Do not eat them.
korean_text: 지느러미와 비늘이 없는 모든 것은 너희가 먹지 말지니 이는 너희에게 부정함이니라

sentences.original_text: But other things that live in the water
do not have fins or scales
Those are not clean food for you
